sentences: Kuriteo eest m채채rati tal kaks aastat vanglakaristust.
See on karm karistus sellise v채ikese vea eest.
Karistused peaksid olema proportsionaalsed kuriteo t천sidusele.
context: The Estonian word 'karistus' means punishment, penalty or sentence. It refers to a punitive measure imposed for wrongdoing, whether legal penalties for crimes or disciplinary measures for rule violations. The word can refer to various types of punishments including imprisonment (vanglakaristus), fines, or other sanctions.
